text: (nabiye!) mema ratavalvala itihasaya obata pavasannemu. (mevaye vasaya kala) ovunta (deviyan visin) yavanu læbu dutayin ovun veta niyata vasayenma pæhædili sadhakayanma gena avaha. ehet ovun nam, kalin boru kala ekak (pasuva kisi kalekat) visvasaya notæbu aya vasayenma sitiyaha. mesema pratiksepa karannange hrdayanhi allah mudra taba harinneya
